item.description:
Our book discussion in August will be abbreviated so we can enjoy the simultaneous picnic at the Lyons' home in Cornwall. We will discuss chapter 6, "The God Hypothesis" of Carl Sagan and Ann Druyan's "The Varieties of Scientific Experience: A Personal View of the Search for God." There are copies of this book in Connecticut public libraries as well as in book stores and at Amazon.com.

This link will take you to the book at amazon.com:
http://www.amazon.com...

For more information, see http://www.cthumanist...
item.name: Humanist Association of Connecticut Book Discussion
